summary:
This adds four new hoods into the game.
It has also taken two other items (Gloves and Robe) and converted them into Heavy/Light craftable items.
All are craftable from a new perk \"Grim Reaper Smithing\" put into the smithing tree.

Comments and Constructive Critism Welcome. 
Hope you enjoy.

Kempalot
descriptionHtml:
This adds four new hoods into the game.
It has also taken two other items (Gloves and Robe) and converted them into Heavy/Light craftable items.

All items are available in heavy and light form and are crafted using the \'Grim Reaper Smithing\' Perk which can be learned with 70 smithing and after getting \'Arcane Blacksmithing\'. They are found in the \'Misc\' section of the smithing window. I have also added a cloth form which does not require the perk for construction.

Armour rating is the same as:
Heavy = Daedric
Light = Glass
Cloth = None

I created these due to popular demand from my other Scythe mods.

See my Scythe mods:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=15850

See this mod in the steam workshop:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=21600&tscn=1344727449

Comments and Constructive Critism Welcome. 
Hope you enjoy.

Kempalot
author: Kempalot
